data.eml:eml: Three new species of the subterranean huntsman spider genus Spariolenus (Araneae, Sparassidae, Heteropodinae) in Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Moradmand, Majid (2017): Three new species of the subterranean huntsman spider genus Spariolenus (Araneae, Sparassidae, Heteropodinae) in Iran. Subterranean Biology 24: 11-25, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.24.20985, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/subtbiol.24.20985
